gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 126, Hawks 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Hawks, 126-108. Obi Toppin recorded 18 points, six rebounds, and four assists for the Pacers, with Buddy Hield adding 18 points (4-6 3PM) and three rebounds in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 29 points, four rebounds, and four assists for the Hawks in the defeat. The Pacers have won three in a row and improve to 23-15 in the regular season, while the Hawks fall to 15-22.
